title: Sketchbook Folio, "Waves and Large Rock with Birds and Distant Boats", 1885–90
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster,
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Ocean in foreground breaking on a single, large, prominent rock at center. Above rock, birds in flight. On horizon at left, two distant boats.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Waves and Large Rock with Birds and Distant Boats", 1885–90.
1885–90. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-84-46.
